Girl dad, Business Intelligence Developer, runner. Thomas Chatting is a 30 year old IT professional working in the public sector in Data Warehousing. Thomas works with T-SQL, C# and coffee. When not writing in the third-person, Thomas can be found on Twitter as @_tomch, GitHub, LinkedIn, Mastodon, and Instagram.

This site is hosted on GitHub pages using Jekyll, and most of the content is written in John Gruber's Markdown.

The code for this site and all of the posts in raw format can be poked around with on its GitHub Repository, but please don't steal (my) stuff.

This site is powered by Jekyll and hosted by GitHub.
